name: Hot Soup (Infinimaker)
description:
Controls

Z - Jump

X - Spin

C - Collect/Dropoff ingredients

Arrows - Movement

                Your soup is very hot! It's bubbling, it's splattering, and just going everywhere. Avoid the soup as it goes everywhere. Gather your ingredients before it burns. This is a fast-paced, random game, with multiple patterns, multiple ingredients, and multiple ways to have fun. Sit down, make some soup, and have a great time! Good luck!
